tests.text: You should use const to declare your isEven variable.
Your isEven function should use the modulo operator %.
Your isEven function should return true for even numbers.
Your isEven function should return false for odd numbers.

description: Declare an isEven function, which takes a num parameter and returns true if the number is even, and false otherwise. Use the modulo operator % to determine if a number is even or odd.
